$!If you think your vehicle or one of its related parts has a serious safety defect you can report this to the Vehicle and Operator Services Agency (VOSA).$!

Complete the form below and send this to VOSA (contact details are on the form). They will pass any relevant information on to the manufacturer for them to investigate further.

$D
[Download ‘Vehicle safety defect reporting form’ (DOC, 779KB)](http://www.dft.gov.uk/vosa/repository/Vehicle%20Safety%20Defect%20Reporting%20Form.doc "Download ‘Vehicle safety defect reporting form’ (DOC, 779KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

##Before reporting a safety defect

Before reporting a safety defect you should make sure the problem with your vehicle is a ‘serious safety defect’.

VOSA defines this as a ‘feature of design or construction liable to cause a significant risk of personal injury or death’.

Things that aren’t serious safety defects include:

* defects that can be identified during routine maintenance and servicing
* defects that give prior warning from warning lights, marked changes in handling and unusual noises

For more information about safety defects, read VOSA's 'Consumers’ guide to vehicle safety defects'.

$D
[Download 'Consumers’ guide to vehicle safety defects' (PDF 312KB)](http://www.dft.gov.uk/vosa/repository/Consumer%20guide%20to%20vehicle%20safety%20defects%20Nov%2011.pdf "Download 'Consumers’ guide to vehicle safety defects' (PDF 312KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

###Recalled vehicles

If a fault is discovered in a vehicle make or model after manufacturing it might be [recalled.](/check-if-a-vehicle-has-been-recalled "Check if a vehicle model has been recalled")

For more information about safety recalls, read VOSA's 'Consumers’ guide to vehicle safety recalls'.

$D
[Download 'Consumers’ guide to vehicle safety recalls' (PDF 301KB)](http://www.dft.gov.uk/vosa/repository/Consumer%20guide%20to%20vehicle%20safety%20recalls%20Nov11.pdf "Download VOSA's 'Consumers’ guide to vehicle safety recalls' (PDF 301KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D


*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
